data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Gorno-Altay, Russia from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gorno-Altay, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Gorno-Altay who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 68 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Gorno-Altay, Russia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 3,018 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Kereks people might believe through him.
Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Gorno-Altay.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Gorno-Altay, Russia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Gorno-Altay, Russia has a population of 206,200.

We estimate Gorno-Altay has 3,018 people who might know Jesus, 115,736 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 87,446 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Gorno-Altay. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

location.name: Gorno-Altay
location.people_groups_list: Tubalars, Altai, Chinese, general, Telengit, Kumandins
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tubalars (2,000), Altai (76,000), Chinese, general (30,000), Telengit (3,800), Kumandins (2,900)
